General.Name: CF Acquisition IV Corp
General.Description: CF Acquisition Corp. IV does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the financial services, healthcare, real estate, technology, and software industries. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
